Material used.Description: Cells stably expressing L10P, L166P, P158DEL DJ-1 variants were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced for the L10P variant.
Protein expression was reduced for the P158DEL variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple independent cell lines were analyzed.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels comparable to wild-type DJ-1.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced protein expression compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Material used.Description: Recombinant L10P, L166P, P158DEL DJ-1 proteins were analyzed.

Readout description.Result Description: Solubility was reduced for the L10P variant.
Solubility was reduced for the P158DEL variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Solubility levels comparable to wild-type DJ-1.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced solubility compared to wild-type DJ-1.
